result.title: Most problem with contest
result.content:
Salam Dar inja gharare yek seri moshkelati bepardazim ke hame avalesh

Esgtebah darn badan yad migiran .

.
                    How we can submit a answer ?
                    ----------------------------

  1. Javab khod ra ba format .cpp zakhire konid

  2. Zaban c++ ra entekhab konid .( gnu ya visual )

  3. File khod ra open konid va dar safhey vared shode agar yek bar refresh konid mibinid ke aya javab shoma dorost ast ya na.

Nokte : akhar barname return pause ya exit succecs nagozarid

Be jay on return 0 begozarid.

Movafagh basgid.

يا حق
